_meanings:
{@--4@} To strip off, 
deprive of, despoil, take away;  
{#vfMtAcSlaTaM harati puzpamanokahAnAM#} <ls>R. 5. 69</ls>,
<ls>Bk. 15. 116</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 334.</ls>

{@--2@} To cause to be taken
away, to lose, be deprived of.
